title: Communicating With Animals - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/14/18
itunes:title: Communicating With Animals - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/14/18
description:
George Noory and animal communicator Sandra Mendelson discuss her work with horses, dogs and other animals, how they get messages to her, and what animals are trying to tell humans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
